ing: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice
des: "These are fun little treats that my mother used to make! Great for kids! Pop them out of the freezer for a quick treat!"
ins: In a large bowl, stir together the sour cream, lemon juice, sugar and salt until blended. Fold in the pineapple, cherries, bananas and pecans. Pour into paper lined muffin tins. Freeze until set, then transfer to resealable freezer bags for storage.
